Class StateChangeDispatcher<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.fastcast.statemachine.StateChangeDispatcher<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - Enumerator with all possible states

    public class StateChangeDispatcher<S>
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper dispatcher class for gather all listeners listen for state changes.

    t.gdala
